name: Fruit Fall
shortDescription: Premature dropping of fruits before maturity
description: Fruit fall is a major concern for orchard farmers, causing significant yield losses. It occurs due to hormonal imbalances, nutrient deficiencies, pest attacks, or environmental stress.
symptoms: Fruits dropping before reaching full size
scientificExplanation: Organic oils containing natural plant hormones help regulate ethylene production and strengthen the abscission layer between fruit and stem. They also provide essential nutrients that prevent premature fruit drop.
preventionTips: Apply organic oils at flowering stage

name: Leaf Curl
shortDescription: Distortion and curling of plant leaves
description: Leaf curl causes leaves to twist, cup, or roll, affecting photosynthesis and plant health. It's commonly caused by viral infections, pest infestations, or environmental factors.
scientificExplanation: Organic oils work by controlling the insect vectors that spread leaf curl viruses. Neem-based oils also have antiviral properties that help infected plants recover while preventing spread to healthy plants.

name: Root Damage
description: Healthy roots are essential for nutrient and water uptake. Root damage from pathogens, pests, or poor soil conditions severely impacts plant growth and survival.
scientificExplanation: Organic oils with antifungal properties create an unfavorable environment for root pathogens. They also promote beneficial soil microbes that protect roots and enhance nutrient availability.

name: Pest Infestation
shortDescription: Attack by harmful insects and mites
description: Pest infestations can devastate crops through direct feeding damage and disease transmission. Early detection and organic control measures are crucial for protection.
scientificExplanation: Organic oils disrupt pest feeding, reproduction, and development. Neem oil's azadirachtin compound acts as an anti-feedant, growth regulator, and repellent, providing multiple modes of action that prevent resistance.
preventionTips: Apply oils at first sign of pests

name: Fungal Disease
description: Fungal diseases are among the most common crop problems, causing leaf spots, wilts, rots, and mildews. They thrive in humid conditions and spread rapidly.
symptoms: Powdery or fuzzy growth on leaves
scientificExplanation: Organic oils form a protective barrier on plant surfaces that prevents fungal spore germination. They also contain natural antifungal compounds that destroy existing infections and boost plant immunity.

name: Stunted Growth
description: Stunted growth results in undersized plants with reduced yields. It can be caused by nutrient deficiencies, root problems, pest damage, or environmental stress.
scientificExplanation: Organic growth oils provide essential fatty acids and natural growth promoters that stimulate cell division and elongation. They also improve nutrient uptake efficiency, helping plants overcome deficiency-related growth issues.
